thread.title: Ground News - StormTracker Alert: Flood watch issued ahead of heavy rain
thread.title_full: Ground News - StormTracker Alert: Flood watch issued ahead of heavy rain

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - StormTracker Alert: Flood watch issued ahead of heavy rain
text:
Summary by Ground News A flood watch has been issued for all of Connecticut starting Saturday morning and lasting through Sunday morning. Temperatures on Friday will be in the 40s, but there is also a winter weather advisory for Litchfield and Hartford counties. A few light snow showers and areas of freezing rain cannot be ruled out late Friday night and Saturday morning before the rain takes over. Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
